abstracts.cdata!:
The objective Additional Financing for
            the Second Phase of Third Education Sector Project is to
            improve access of underserved communities to, and quality,
            of education in The Gambia, with a particular focus on
            primary education (lower-basic education) and teacher
            quality. The restructuring seeks the approval of the
            Regional Vice President (RVP) to extend the closing dates of
            the original financing and of the additional financing to
            December 31, 2013, in order to: 1) allow completion of
            certain Project activities, 2) reallocate proceeds between
            disbursement categories, 3) expand the scope of financing of
            H590 to component three of the project in order to finance
            civil works that were initially to be financed from H230,
            and 4) adjust the results framework to amend some targets as
            commensurate with sectoral progress and to be better aligned
            with the slightly adjusted project activities.
